generate_openVAS_report.desc: read a content of an openVAS report [Parameter: report id(i,e 0b0e6d50-98ae-4f9c-9e67-6c2c7504280d0]

get_openVAS_tasks.desc: get all task from OpenVAS scanner

get_openVAS_task_id.desc: get specific task details including task status,progress,target and more from OpenVAS scanner [Parameter: Task ID]

start_openVAS_scan.desc: start and openVAS scan on a target IP [Parameters: TARGET_IP, TARGET_NAME, and TASK_NAME]
